Package com.pizzaMakerApp.controller

Class AppController

java.lang.Object
com.pizzaMakerApp.controller.AppController
public class AppController extends Object
Controller class for the Pizza Maker application. Manages the interaction between the model (OrderManager and Order) and the views (ManagerView and OrderView). The controller initializes listeners for the ManagerView's order list, as well as buttons in the OrderView. It provides methods to handle order validation, refusal, and updates. Additionally, the controller sets up a timer to periodically update the order list.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppController

      public AppController(OrderManager orderManagerModel, ManagerView managerView, Order orderModel, OrderView orderView)
      Initializes listeners for the ManagerView's order list and OrderView's buttons. Also sets up a timer for periodic order updates.
      Parameters:
      orderManagerModel - The model managing orders.
      managerView - The view for managing orders.
      orderModel - The model representing an individual order.
      orderView - The view for displaying an individual order.

  • Method Details

    • updateOrderView

      public void updateOrderView()
      Updates the OrderView to reflect changes in the underlying data model. This method triggers the update mechanism in the OrderView.

    • updateOrderList

      public void updateOrderList(boolean selectfirst)
      Updates the order list in the ManagerView by clearing the current list of orders, reloading orders from the database, and updating the view with the refreshed order list.
      Parameters:
      selectfirst - If true, selects the first item in the updated order list.
